about_the_game:
The M-1 Grand Prix is the premier stage for comedians testing their chops to determine who is the best comedy duo.
It is a long and arduous journey to reach the big stage, knocking down rivals left and right...
The "M-1 Grand Prix 2020" champion game directed by Noda Crystal of Magical Lovely is now available on Steam!

Choose one team of four comedians!

Magical Lovely
Orthodox fighting style and power style with hammer.

Sisonne
Long-range attacks with chains and powerful attacks with swords.

Panther
Speed style, power style, and shouting "Thank You!".

Kaerutei
Dance attack with a machete and ultra wide range attack with a chainsaw.

(and more...)

Use unique attacks, flashy special moves, and an exchange system with your friends to make it to the finals!
And on the final stage, the ultimate comedians await you!


Main features of the game:
・M-1 Champion Noda Crystal's game!
・A traditional horizontal scrolling action game featuring famous Japanese comedians fighting each other
・Easy to use and exhilarating action! Use both your normal attacks and powerful special moves to get through the stages
・Use the "Shift System" to cooperate with your partner.
・If you clear the game, a very special character awaits you as a playable character

The M-1 Grand Prix is the premier stage for comedians testing their chops to determine who is the best comedy duo.
It is a long and arduous journey to reach the big stage, knocking down rivals left and right...
The "M-1 Grand Prix 2020" champion game directed by Noda Crystal of Magical Lovely is now available on Steam!

Choose one team of four comedians!

(and more...)

Use unique attacks, flashy special moves, and an exchange system with your friends to make it to the finals!
And on the final stage, the ultimate comedians await you!


Main features of the game:
・M-1 Champion Noda Crystal's game!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Lion 10.7, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core 2 Duo E7500
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: This is an exciting horizontal scrolling action game set in the world of "M-1 Grand Prix". Numerous rivals stand in the way stopping you, a comedian duo, from reaching the stage. Who will be waiting for you when they reach the final stage?
